meaningMnemonic: Your boss says she's going to <kanji>decrease</kanji> your <kanji>salary</kanji> with a company-wide <vocabulary>salary reduction</vocabulary>. You should probably start looking for a new job that won't do <vocabulary>salary cut</vocabulary>s like this.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out because ほう becomes ぽう here.
